Introduction
This topic contains information on general conduct for hearings, including
non-adversarial nature of hearings and questioning witnesses
decorum and appearance of VA personnel
obligation to assist in developing facts
prohibition against conveying an “expected” decision during a hearing
, and
inappropriate behavior by hearing attendees
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 1, Section D  - Regional Office (RO) Hearings
citation: Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 1, Section D
